backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Product, Order, Cart, and UserProfile modules with CRUD operations, access control via MixinAuthorization, and admin-only product management functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: user-facing order details page, navigation from order confirmation to order details, and admin order details view with expanded information.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing the blue-cyan gradient theme, Space Grotesk typography, routing structure including new order details page, and component functionality across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title "OM FANCY" and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup defining routes for product catalog, checkout, order confirmation, order details (/orders/:orderId), and admin pages with AdminGuard protection, wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin status using useInternetIdentity and useIsAdmin hooks, displaying access denied messages for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart panel displaying cart items with images, prices, total calculation, clear cart functionality, and checkout navigation with gradient styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx: Shopping cart button with badge showing item count, opens a sheet drawer containing the Cart component when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header containing logo, navigation links (Products, Manage Products, Orders for admins), cart button, and login button. Includes footer with copyright and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login and logout states, handles Internet Identity authentication flow, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name on first login, blocking interaction until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence in local storage, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including product queries, cart management, checkout, order retrieval, and admin product/order mutations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a modern vibrant color scheme for both light and dark modes, plus typography settings using Space Grotesk and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page displaying all customer orders in an accordion layout with order details, customer information, and product lists. Includes navigation to individual order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin product management page with CRUD operations for products including add, edit, and delete functionality with image upload support. Uses dialogs for forms and handles price conversion to cents.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with shipping information form and order summary displaying cart items and total. Validates form inputs and processes checkout, redirecting to order confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page displaying successful order details including ordered items, total price, and order ID. Shows success animation and provides navigation back to store.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx: Customer-facing order details page showing specific order information including customer profile, ordered products, and total. Includes back navigation and handles order not found states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Product catalog page component that displays a hero banner and grid of products with add-to-cart functionality, requiring Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, animations, shadows, and typography settings for the application's design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the e-commerce application's features, including implemented order details pages for users and admins, with one pending feature request.
